Terms of Service

Last updated: September 15, 2023

Agreement to Terms

By accessing and using StoryBlog, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our service.

User Accounts

When creating an account, you must:

  • Provide accurate and complete information
  • Maintain the security of your account
  • Promptly update any changes to your information
  • Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

Content Guidelines

Users must not post content that:

  • Violates any applicable laws
  • Infringes on intellectual property rights
  • Contains harmful or malicious code
  • Harasses, abuses, or threatens others
  • Is spam, fraudulent, or misleading

Intellectual Property

The service and its original content (excluding content provided by users) remain the sole property of StoryBlog. Our service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

Termination

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason including breach of these Terms.
